Blog and Tutorials

Building an Embedded System with a Rich GUI - Tutorial Part 0 (30 July 2020)

In today's era of HD-capable smartphones, customers expect high quality, visually appealing graphical user interfaces. In this tutorial we'll set up and build a demo application using TouchGFX, a GUI framework for STM32 microcontrollers. This is the first of a series of tutorials covering the TouchGFX framework and the design of an embedded system.
